title: 21 Black Friday Coffee Maker Deals of 2024 to Keep You Wired
description: No matter how you savor your beans, there's something brewing here for you
author: Megan Wahn, Audrey Lee
excerpt: The Black Friday coffee maker deals of 2024 are coming in piping hot—you won’t want to miss these savings on espresso machines, French presses, and beyond.
text: If your morning routine could use a perk-up, these Black Friday coffee maker deals can help. The sales bonanza taking place during Cyber Week is yielding a deluge of deals on programmable single-serve machines, high-end espresso machines with add-ons like built-in milk frothers, options for iced coffee fans, plus some new takes on the classic drip coffee maker. Even those who prefer tea over a cup of coffee will find a win in the following list—some of the machines promise water heated perfectly for your wake-up mug of tea.Best-looking coffee maker: Technivorm Moccamaster 10-Cup Coffee Maker (was $359, now $180)Best pod coffee maker: Keurig K-Elite Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker (was $190, now $110)Best large batch coffee maker: Zwilling Enfinigy 12-Cup Drip Coffee Maker (was $200, now $150)Best budget coffee maker: WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso Maker (was $70, now $56)Best splurge coffee maker: Terra Kaffe TK-01 Automatic Espresso Coffee Machine (was $895, now $720)We’re keeping tabs on the finest deals on coffee makers and related accessories that will help you stay caffeinated. You know what they say about early birds, so grab your brew of choice—you’re going to need it to stay on top of all the Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales to come.Best coffee maker dealsKeurig K-Elite Coffee Maker, Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee BrewerFor those looking for the perfect excuse to finally splurge on one of the most classic pod coffee makers out there, this coffee maker deal is just for you. Shop now to get the Keurig K-Elite for 47% off the standard price.Takeya Deluxe Cold Brew Coffee MakerNow might not be the season for cold coffee, but if there were ever the time to invest in a cold brew coffee maker, it’s now when you can score one with major savings. This pitcher from Takeya is on sale for 25% and can even be put in the dishwasher.KitchenAid KCM1208DG Drip Spiral Showerhead Coffee MakerKitchenAid is a staple name in the kitchen appliance space, so it makes sense that the brand would have coffee brewers in the rolodex of gadgets and cookware it produces. This 12-cup coffee maker features a 29-hole showerhead that helps coat your ground coffee more evenly and give you the best coffee every morning. Plus, it’s currently 23% off.Zwilling Enfinigy 12-Cup Drip Coffee MakerAmong Nordstrom’s many holiday deals, you’ll find this stylish Zwilling drip coffee maker that has a showerhead designed to moisten coffee grounds thoroughly and evenly, resulting in smoother and richer coffee. Throw in a good-quality and reusable coffee filter, and you’ve got a gift any caffeine lover would appreciate. handy about Cuisinart’s fully automatic coffee machine is the 24-hour advanced brew start, which makes it easy to schedule your next caffeine fix. It also has a self-cleaning function, an adjustable auto-off, and a ready alert to deliver the easiest brewing experience possible. Plus, the over-ice feature means you can make iced coffee that isn’t watered down.Technivorm Moccamaster 10-Cup Coffee Maker with Glass CarafeThe retro-looking Moccamaster coffee maker from Technivorm is one of the coolest looking machines out there. Thanks to its simplicity and dialed-in design, it’s super easy to use—you just fill the brew basket, add water, and flip the on/off switch. It brews in just 5-6 minutes and can handle up to 10 cups of coffee at one time.Ninja CFP201 DualBrew System 12-Cup Coffee MakerNinja is a well-known brand in the kitchen gadget space. Many know them for their air fryers and blenders, but it also has a few coffee makers on the market. For a versatile machine that can handle both pods and ground coffee, pick up this Ninja coffee maker that’s on sale now. You can have make servings by the mug or in a glass carafe to add some variety to your routine.Braun KF7070 BrewSense Drip Glass CoffeemakerA stylish and pretty affordable coffee maker, the Braun is just a little more reasonably priced this Black Friday. It can brew both small and large batches (either a few cups at a time or a large carafe) and comes with customization features like two different brew strengths and three different settings on the warming plate. Plus it’ll automatically shut off whenever you remove the carafe from the machine.Café Specialty Drip Coffee MakerFor a futuristic-looking coffee maker that’ll add to your counter’s curb appeal while also delivering a quality cup of coffee again and again, try this drip coffee maker from Café Specialty. With a small footprint and sleek colorways, it’s especially ideal for anyone living in a studio apartment.Wolf Gourmet Programmable Coffee Maker SystemWolf does a perfect job of extracting just the right amount of flavor for a quality coffee-drinking experience, and that’s why it’s one of the best drip coffee makers. It has the iconic red knobs (which can be swapped out for black or stainless steel options instead) and also offers the level of quality and precise temperature control that you would expect from Wolf.De’Longhi Magnifica Evo with LatteCrema SystemOur favorite coffee maker with espresso capabilities, the Magnifica Evo brews a delicious, regular-old cup of joe, but it also can also make espresso, cappuccino, latte macchiato, over ice, and customized lattes. The LatteCrema System technology uses a manual froth maker to create textured art, and the frother can be used with regular milk and also alternative milks. It also has a built-in grinder, which saves you time and cash. Our reviewer Terri Williams’s favorite feature? “The coffee and espresso maker has a conical burr grinder with 13 settings, but it can be bypassed to use ground coffee instead to make a pot or cup of coffee.” It is a significant $300 off during the Amazon Black Friday sale, so we recommend jumping on this one while it’s hot!Terra Kaffe TK-01 Automatic Espresso Coffee MachineThis beautiful machine will not only spruce up your kitchen immediately, it will brew up a darn good shot of espresso with no effort on your part (and no coffee pods). The TK-01 grinds and brews according to your exact specifications, which you set up via touch screen. Plus, the TK-01 comes with a water filter and milk carafe. Yes, barista!Espro P7 French PressIf you want a portable coffee maker that you can use anywhere, or you just like the idea of being totally in control of the brewing process for the perfect cup of coffee, the Espro P7 French Press is for you. It requires no electricity, just hot water and coffee grounds. After mixing, it needs to sit for four minutes before pressing the plunger. And unlike many French press options that leave a lot of grinds in the coffee, the Espro P7 uses dual micro filters to keep sludge out for a great taste every time.OXO Brew 9 Cup Stainless Steel Coffee MakerThis is our favorite coffee maker you can buy. If you don’t like punching a bunch of buttons and dials, you’ll love this drip coffee maker because it has a single button all programming. The display shows the time and the brew status. We’re fans of stainless-steel carafes, and this one has a double-wall stainless-steel thermal carafe to ensure hot coffee for a long time. It also has a pause and pour feature: When you remove the carafe before the brew time, the cycle will automatically pause so you can pour a cup of coffee and then place the carafe back in place for it to continue brewing.Cuisinart Coffee Center 12 Cup Programmable Coffeemaker & Single-Serve BrewerCuisinart's sleek-looking one-cup coffee maker has three different ways for you to brew coffee, whether you prefer single-use pods, pre-ground beans, or fresh-ground beans. The machine also gives you the ability to choose between 8 oz., 10 oz. and 12 oz. serving sizes and features a removable drip tray which can make extra room for extra large travel mugs.Instant Pot Dual Pod Plus 3-in-1 Coffee MakerInstant Pot makes more than just, well, Instant Pots—they’ve also got some coffee makers on their roster that have garnered positive review. So if you love the Instant Pot and are interested in trying more of their products, this Dual Pod Plus single serve coffee maker (that’s compatible with K-Cup pods and Nespresso capsules) is 13% off as we speak.Alessi Press Filter Coffee MakerFor the coffee-lovers who like a more traditional, analog way of making coffee, you'll like this clean and stylish French press, also from Alessi, that's currently on sale.Best Espresso Machine DealsDe'Longhi All in One Combination Coffee MakerThis 2-in-1 De’Longhi combination brewer offers both a full cappuccino system and drip-coffee brewer experience—meaning you’ll be able to pregame your pot of joe with a nice espresso. It’s also got luxurious features like a digital touchscreen, bold brew setting, and steam wand for frothing milk. The icing on top? It is currently $50 off at Williams-Sonoma during their Black Friday sale.Aeropress Original Coffee PressAnother one of our favorite espresso makers on deal during Black Friday is also one of the simplest: The Aeropress, which allows you to brew and enjoy a solid cup in under two minutes. Resident foodie Lauren Jospeh called this very portable gadget “about as close as you can get to an espresso at home without a counter space-stealing espresso machine.”WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso MakerEver wanted to make coffee on the go? Now you can. This portable espresso maker uses pressure and a pumping system to brew espresso in a compact container wherever you are. Once you’re done, simply dispense into the small attached espresso shot cup. You can buy it now at 20% off in black or in three other colorways.De'Longhi Espresso machine, Premium FrotherA great entry into the world of at-home espresso, this machine from De’Longhi will have you brewing up espresso and pouring cappuccinos like a real barista. It comes with a built-in milk steamer and is a manual machine, meaning you can pull a shot just like they do at your local café. Next thing you know, you’re an expert espresso maker.Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Machine by De'LonghiEven though the Essenza Mini by Nespresso that our contributor and coffee aficionado Lauren Joseph called “an excellent choice that consistently yields great espresso” isn’t on sale at the moment, this equally sleek Nespresso machine is available at a notable 30% off discount. You can choose from six different brews, including four drip settings and two espresso settings. Plus, you can choose to brew over ice, meaning you won’t end up with a watery iced latte.
html:
If your morning routine could use a perk-up, these Black Friday coffee maker deals can help. The sales bonanza taking place during Cyber Week is yielding a deluge of deals on programmable single-serve machines, high-end espresso machines with add-ons like built-in milk frothers, options for iced coffee fans, plus some new takes on the classic drip coffee maker. Even those who prefer tea over a cup of coffee will find a win in the following list—some of the machines promise water heated perfectly for your wake-up mug of tea.

  • Best-looking coffee maker: Technivorm Moccamaster 10-Cup Coffee Maker (was $359, now $180)
  • Best pod coffee maker: Keurig K-Elite Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker (was $190, now $110)
  • Best large batch coffee maker: Zwilling Enfinigy 12-Cup Drip Coffee Maker (was $200, now $150)
  • Best budget coffee maker: WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso Maker (was $70, now $56)
  • Best splurge coffee maker: Terra Kaffe TK-01 Automatic Espresso Coffee Machine (was $895, now $720)

We’re keeping tabs on the finest deals on coffee makers and related accessories that will help you stay caffeinated. You know what they say about early birds, so grab your brew of choice—you’re going to need it to stay on top of all the Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales to come.

Best coffee maker deals

Keurig K-Elite Coffee Maker, Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Brewer

For those looking for the perfect excuse to finally splurge on one of the most classic pod coffee makers out there, this coffee maker deal is just for you. Shop now to get the Keurig K-Elite for 47% off the standard price.

Takeya Deluxe Cold Brew Coffee Maker

Now might not be the season for cold coffee, but if there were ever the time to invest in a cold brew coffee maker, it’s now when you can score one with major savings. This pitcher from Takeya is on sale for 25% and can even be put in the dishwasher.

KitchenAid KCM1208DG Drip Spiral Showerhead Coffee Maker

KitchenAid is a staple name in the kitchen appliance space, so it makes sense that the brand would have coffee brewers in the rolodex of gadgets and cookware it produces. This 12-cup coffee maker features a 29-hole showerhead that helps coat your ground coffee more evenly and give you the best coffee every morning. Plus, it’s currently 23% off.

Zwilling Enfinigy 12-Cup Drip Coffee Maker

Among Nordstrom’s many holiday deals, you’ll find this stylish Zwilling drip coffee maker that has a showerhead designed to moisten coffee grounds thoroughly and evenly, resulting in smoother and richer coffee. Throw in a good-quality and reusable coffee filter, and you’ve got a gift any caffeine lover would appreciate. handy about Cuisinart’s fully automatic coffee machine is the 24-hour advanced brew start, which makes it easy to schedule your next caffeine fix. It also has a self-cleaning function, an adjustable auto-off, and a ready alert to deliver the easiest brewing experience possible. Plus, the over-ice feature means you can make iced coffee that isn’t watered down.

Technivorm Moccamaster 10-Cup Coffee Maker with Glass Carafe

The retro-looking Moccamaster coffee maker from Technivorm is one of the coolest looking machines out there. Thanks to its simplicity and dialed-in design, it’s super easy to use—you just fill the brew basket, add water, and flip the on/off switch. It brews in just 5-6 minutes and can handle up to 10 cups of coffee at one time.

Ninja CFP201 DualBrew System 12-Cup Coffee Maker

Ninja is a well-known brand in the kitchen gadget space. Many know them for their air fryers and blenders, but it also has a few coffee makers on the market. For a versatile machine that can handle both pods and ground coffee, pick up this Ninja coffee maker that’s on sale now. You can have make servings by the mug or in a glass carafe to add some variety to your routine.

Braun KF7070 BrewSense Drip Glass Coffeemaker

A stylish and pretty affordable coffee maker, the Braun is just a little more reasonably priced this Black Friday. It can brew both small and large batches (either a few cups at a time or a large carafe) and comes with customization features like two different brew strengths and three different settings on the warming plate. Plus it’ll automatically shut off whenever you remove the carafe from the machine.

Café Specialty Drip Coffee Maker

For a futuristic-looking coffee maker that’ll add to your counter’s curb appeal while also delivering a quality cup of coffee again and again, try this drip coffee maker from Café Specialty. With a small footprint and sleek colorways, it’s especially ideal for anyone living in a studio apartment.

Wolf Gourmet Programmable Coffee Maker System

Wolf does a perfect job of extracting just the right amount of flavor for a quality coffee-drinking experience, and that’s why it’s one of the best drip coffee makers. It has the iconic red knobs (which can be swapped out for black or stainless steel options instead) and also offers the level of quality and precise temperature control that you would expect from Wolf.

De’Longhi Magnifica Evo with LatteCrema System

Our favorite coffee maker with espresso capabilities, the Magnifica Evo brews a delicious, regular-old cup of joe, but it also can also make espresso, cappuccino, latte macchiato, over ice, and customized lattes. The LatteCrema System technology uses a manual froth maker to create textured art, and the frother can be used with regular milk and also alternative milks. It also has a built-in grinder, which saves you time and cash. Our reviewer Terri Williams’s favorite feature? “The coffee and espresso maker has a conical burr grinder with 13 settings, but it can be bypassed to use ground coffee instead to make a pot or cup of coffee.” It is a significant $300 off during the Amazon Black Friday sale, so we recommend jumping on this one while it’s hot!

Terra Kaffe TK-01 Automatic Espresso Coffee Machine

This beautiful machine will not only spruce up your kitchen immediately, it will brew up a darn good shot of espresso with no effort on your part (and no coffee pods). The TK-01 grinds and brews according to your exact specifications, which you set up via touch screen. Plus, the TK-01 comes with a water filter and milk carafe. Yes, barista!

Espro P7 French Press

If you want a portable coffee maker that you can use anywhere, or you just like the idea of being totally in control of the brewing process for the perfect cup of coffee, the Espro P7 French Press is for you. It requires no electricity, just hot water and coffee grounds. After mixing, it needs to sit for four minutes before pressing the plunger. And unlike many French press options that leave a lot of grinds in the coffee, the Espro P7 uses dual micro filters to keep sludge out for a great taste every time.

OXO Brew 9 Cup Stainless Steel Coffee Maker

This is our favorite coffee maker you can buy. If you don’t like punching a bunch of buttons and dials, you’ll love this drip coffee maker because it has a single button all programming. The display shows the time and the brew status. We’re fans of stainless-steel carafes, and this one has a double-wall stainless-steel thermal carafe to ensure hot coffee for a long time. It also has a pause and pour feature: When you remove the carafe before the brew time, the cycle will automatically pause so you can pour a cup of coffee and then place the carafe back in place for it to continue brewing.

Cuisinart Coffee Center 12 Cup Programmable Coffeemaker & Single-Serve Brewer

Cuisinart's sleek-looking one-cup coffee maker has three different ways for you to brew coffee, whether you prefer single-use pods, pre-ground beans, or fresh-ground beans. The machine also gives you the ability to choose between 8 oz., 10 oz. and 12 oz. serving sizes and features a removable drip tray which can make extra room for extra large travel mugs.

Instant Pot Dual Pod Plus 3-in-1 Coffee Maker

Instant Pot makes more than just, well, Instant Pots—they’ve also got some coffee makers on their roster that have garnered positive review. So if you love the Instant Pot and are interested in trying more of their products, this Dual Pod Plus single serve coffee maker (that’s compatible with K-Cup pods and Nespresso capsules) is 13% off as we speak.

Alessi Press Filter Coffee Maker

For the coffee-lovers who like a more traditional, analog way of making coffee, you'll like this clean and stylish French press, also from Alessi, that's currently on sale.

Best Espresso Machine Deals

De'Longhi All in One Combination Coffee Maker

This 2-in-1 De’Longhi combination brewer offers both a full cappuccino system and drip-coffee brewer experience—meaning you’ll be able to pregame your pot of joe with a nice espresso. It’s also got luxurious features like a digital touchscreen, bold brew setting, and steam wand for frothing milk. The icing on top? It is currently $50 off at Williams-Sonoma during their Black Friday sale.

Aeropress Original Coffee Press

Another one of our favorite espresso makers on deal during Black Friday is also one of the simplest: The Aeropress, which allows you to brew and enjoy a solid cup in under two minutes. Resident foodie Lauren Jospeh called this very portable gadget “about as close as you can get to an espresso at home without a counter space-stealing espresso machine.”

WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso Maker

Ever wanted to make coffee on the go? Now you can. This portable espresso maker uses pressure and a pumping system to brew espresso in a compact container wherever you are. Once you’re done, simply dispense into the small attached espresso shot cup. You can buy it now at 20% off in black or in three other colorways.

De'Longhi Espresso machine, Premium Frother

A great entry into the world of at-home espresso, this machine from De’Longhi will have you brewing up espresso and pouring cappuccinos like a real barista. It comes with a built-in milk steamer and is a manual machine, meaning you can pull a shot just like they do at your local café. Next thing you know, you’re an expert espresso maker.

Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Machine by De'Longhi

Even though the Essenza Mini by Nespresso that our contributor and coffee aficionado Lauren Joseph called “an excellent choice that consistently yields great espresso” isn’t on sale at the moment, this equally sleek Nespresso machine is available at a notable 30% off discount. You can choose from six different brews, including four drip settings and two espresso settings. Plus, you can choose to brew over ice, meaning you won’t end up with a watery iced latte.
